Super fast virtual scrolling Major UX improvements and UI beautification New Rich Text editor: optional full screen mode mention option also in the RTF Editor Send and display html code in plain and RTF mode Switch to turn RTF editor on and off in the settings VNCpad feature improvements Option to delete images from the media screen Improved message reply workflow

star unstar messages from chat and chat search screen show starred messages only renaming deleting VNCpads notification icon for VNCpad Star favorite feature Full Release Notes: https: vnclagoon.com release notes note group vnctalk

New Features: Improved presence update behaviour. Contact management: Removed depricated xmpp roster contact list management. Switched from LDAP based contact management to Redmine database. User management: New integrated Redmine based user management via web interface replaces user management via LDAP User management via external LDAP still possible. VNCtalk Zimlet is now deprecated and no longer supported. Global search function now also returns contacts in search results. Embedded video player: attached videos can now played directly inline inside the chat window. Improved menu item description in German language Improved reconnection behaviour for the desktop app after system awakes from sleep mode. Bug Fixes: Removed contact s presence indicator from groupchat avatars. Fixed dropouts happening occationally in long audio calls after a while. Fixed sync gap when new messages took a few moments to arrive. Fixed error message informing that the last attached file in a chat has been failed to send when reopening the chat later on even if that is not the case. Fixed list duplication when adding a contact to an existing list Fixed resetting of unrelated configuration values when modifying items in the settings menu. Fixed the incorrect hyphenation of usernames in Groupchat s participant list display. Fixed for big image files that a white backgroud is replacing the chat window on opening until it has been downloaded completely. Fixed an issue where a new user cannot perform a first time login. Groupchat avatars are now displayed in search results window Webclient Desktop app: Fixed layout issues in video calls appearing in web and electron client. VNCtalk App Android iOS : Fixed app crashing sometimes when opening items in Legal notice menu. Fixed the display of notifications when the app is in foreground despite notifications have been explicitely disabled in the settings. Fixed that user avatars are occationally not displayed alongside messages in groupchats VNCtalk App iOS : Fixed jitsi meet implemetation to work with iOS RTC plugin now properly.

New Features: Searchbar added for existing groupchats to menu. Email digest for unread messages added Improved message sync to prevent messages from appearing late in chat window Images stored in Media are now zoomable Implemented file sharing for Documents Audio in chat s Media folder when the App is in foreground. Bug Fixes: Previously opened menus are now closed before opening a new menu to prevent overlapping Links in Search Chat results are now clickable Fixed missing chat history Fixed move to end button displayed in chat window when screen is already at the bottom of the chat. Fixed kebab menu in imageview not working

New Features: Mention: address another group chat member directly via user Options menu is now available for messages in search results as well reply forward etc. Bug Fixes: Missing options menu for the last message in a conversation Opening an item in the document tab of the Media folder causing the app to crash iOS app only: incorrect new messages count displayed on badge Shraring in iOS working again App does not start after upgrade to iOS 12.2.

New Features: Improved performance on reconnect IOM: 1on1 A V calls with external users Bug Fixes: File corruption when a message was received or the app client was closed during the file upload process. Sync issues: messages marked as read not reflected in all clients. Groupchat: fixed incorrect info message on users entering the room.

New Features: Broadcasts Whiteboard can be disabled in settings. Auto subscription of incoming chat users to contact list. Default nofification setting changed to with chat text . Improved Share to VNCtalk App feature. Bug Fixes: Groupchats stay available for external users now so they can rejoin on later login. Fixed UI for Email to a friend option. Fixed that chat history was missing in some cases. On app opening notifications are removed. Glitch in Save changes fixed .

New Features: Native emogies are now used on mobile and MacOS MacOS: changed mapping CTRL Enter to CMD Enter A VNCtalk desktop app has been released Improved language support improved readability for date indicator and unread messages coloring VNCtalk app: You can download images from chat to your mobile Bug Fixes: Avatars for group chats URL preview in chats Capture and send photo function on mobile Mobile notifications are now automatically removed from status bar for read messages

New Features: Avatars can be set for groupchats by the owner now. When browsing the chat history an indicator in the top center informs you about the date when the chat messages currently displayed in the chat window were sent. When opening a chat the history scrolls automatically to the beginning of the first unread message allowing you to pick up the pace more quickly. Unread messages are now displayed in a different color when opening a chat window. A preview for URLs is displayed now in the chat window Improved offline support for the VNCtalk app. A new Yellow Theme is now available for VNCtalk in settings menu. Added new language support: French Added a new overlay submenu when using the Start chat function allowing you to specify upfront if you want to start a 1on1 chat groupchat or initiate a broadcast coming soon . Bug Fixes: A bug causing the VNCtalk app to crash has been fixed Fixed an alignment error in group chat messages. Fixed a Bug in the UI for external users. Fixed issue that the focus is not automatically in the text input field when using the Start chat Start groupchat function.
